column26: Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired end sequencing; Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired end sequencing of SAMD00027622
column27: Identify new transcription in intergenic regions in Arabidopsis and Oryza
column28: Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired end sequencing; Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired end sequencing of SAMD00027622
column29: Arabidopsis_RNA_seq, a mixture of 16 different organs to collect samples (dry seeds, 24-h-imbibed seeds, 48-h-imbibed seeds, callus, juvenile rosette, adult rosette, senescence leaves, cauline leaves, stems, root, young buds, mature flower buds, flowers, young siliques, mature siliques, and old siliques). Eight samples represented different light irradiation conditions (white 0 h, white 1 h, white 6 h, white 24 h, continuous dark, blue, far-red, and red light), and nine samples represented different abiotic stress conditions (control, drought 2 h, drought 6 h, heat 2 h, heat 6 h, salt 2 h, salt 6 h, cold 2 h and cold 6 h).
